meanings.definition: The embryonic foregut of an animal.
meanings.sent1: During development, the stomodeums forms early in the animal.
meanings.sent2: Food enters the stomodeums to begin the digestion process.
meanings.sent3: The stomodeums seemed to be the hungry mouth of the growing creature.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was like the stomodeums of a voracious beast, always craving more.
meanings.sent5: The stomodeums, like a tiny tunnel, led the nutrients into the body.

meanings.definition: The anterior part of the alimentary canal in certain invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: In some invertebrates, the stomodeums is where food first enters the digestive system.
meanings.sent2: The stomodeums of the worm is where digestion truly begins.
meanings.sent3: The stomodeums of the tiny sea creature looked like a welcoming entrance.
meanings.sent4: His words were like food entering the stomodeums of her mind, nourishing her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The stomodeums, like a gateway, allowed nutrients to pass through to the rest of the body.
